targets.query:
// Living Room heating efficiency score
// % of time heating occurs during occupied hours

occupancy = from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "binary_sensor.presence_livingroom")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value == "on" then 1.0 else 0.0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

// Simplified: count when occupied (room above 20Â°C assumed heating)
// Full implementation would check HVAC state
temp = from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "climate.livingroom_thermostat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current_temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value > 20.0 then 1.0 else 0.0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

join(tables: {occ: occupancy, temp: temp}, on: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      heated_occupied: r._value_occ * r._value_temp,
      heated_total: r._value_temp
  }))
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with efficiency: r.heated_occupied / r.heated_total * 100.0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["efficiency"])
  |> yield(name: "efficiency")

// Vacant heating hours (7 days) - Living Room
// Hours room was heated while vacant

occupancy = from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "binary_sensor.presence_livingroom")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value == "on" then 0.0 else 1.0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

temp = from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "climate.livingroom_thermostat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current_temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value > 20.0 then 1.0 else 0.0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

join(tables: {occ: occupancy, temp: temp}, on: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value_occ * r._value_temp * 5.0
  }))
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 60.0}))
  |> yield(name: "vacant_heating")

// Average temperature when occupied vs vacant (Living Room)

occupancy = from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "binary_sensor.presence_livingroom")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

temp = from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "climate.livingroom_thermostat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current_temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

join(tables: {occ: occupancy, temp: temp}, on: ["_time"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value_occ == 1.0)
  |> mean(column: "_value_temp")
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "occupied")
  |> yield(name: "temp_occupied")

// Average temperature when vacant

occupancy = from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "binary_sensor.presence_livingroom")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

temp = from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "climate.livingroom_thermostat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current_temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

join(tables: {occ: occupancy, temp: temp}, on: ["_time"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value_occ == 0.0)
  |> mean(column: "_value_temp")
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "vacant")
  |> yield(name: "temp_vacant")

// Current temperature - all rooms

from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] =~ /climate.*thermostat/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current_temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "current_temp")

// Target temperature (setpoint)

from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] =~ /climate.*thermostat/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "setpoint")

// Average temperature by room (7 days)

from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] =~ /climate.*thermostat/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current_temperature")
  |> group(columns: ["entity_id"])
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with room: r.entity_id}))
  |> yield(name: "avg_temp_by_room")

// Heating efficiency by room
// Shows % heating during occupied hours per room

// Living Room
lr_occ = from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "binary_sensor.presence_livingroom")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value == "on" then 1.0 else 0.0}))

lr_temp = from(bucket: "home-assistant")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "climate.livingroom_thermostat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current_temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value > 20.0 then 1.0 else 0.0}))

lr_efficiency = join(tables: {occ: lr_occ, temp: lr_temp}, on: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      heated_occupied: r._value_occ * r._value_temp,
      heated_total: r._value_temp,
      room: "Living Room"
  }))
  |> group(columns: ["room"])
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with efficiency: r.heated_occupied / r.heated_total * 100.0, _field: "efficiency_score"}))

lr_efficiency
  |> yield(name: "efficiency_by_room")
